name: The Big Elk
description: The Big Elk is a crazy top-down shooter from Siberia with elements of action RPG and strategy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8 Processor: 1.2 Ghz+ Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 60 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 60 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I love this game!  Madness gameplay! Madness characters! Madness world!
The Big Elk is a top-down shooter with medicore graphics and terrible controls. There are free flash games better than this! Go play one of them and save your money.
